title: CN Level 5 â€” Transport Layer: TCP & UDP
intro: This level introduces end-to-end communication using TCP and UDP.
points: Know the role of transport layer: end-to-end logical communication.
Understand TCP features: connection-oriented, reliable, ordered.
Understand UDP: connectionless, best-effort, low overhead.
Know what a port number is and why it is used.
Examples: HTTP over TCP, DNS often over UDP.
